pr_title: Fix translucent blocks not rendering properly when moved by pistons on fabulous

timeline.message: fix translucent block not rendering properly when moving by piston

timeline.bodyText: This does not seem correct. This replaces every render type with TranslucentMovingBlock if the block can render in the Translucent render type, but I think it should only replace the Translucent render layer with TranslucentMovingBlock, or am I wrong?
timeline.author: ichttt

replies.bodyText: Indeed, I'll add a check that this is already in translucent.
replies.author: Cyborgmas
